text: In Old Chicago is a 1938 American drama movie directed by Henry King and starring Tyrone Power, Alice Faye, Alice Brady, Don Ameche, Phyllis Brooks, Andy Devine, Francis Ford, Berton Churchill, June Storey. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1938. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1938 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: In Old Chicago
